column4: Outer loop New Circle Rd between Young Dr and Creative Dr
column5: A school bus is on its side.  No injuries reported at this time.  The outer loop is shut down at Young Dr.  The inner loop left lane is also blocked.

column4: Walnut Hill Rd near Shelby Ln
column5: A single vehicle reportedly struck a tree.
